auto a = 1.3419085418_h;
auto b = 1.0888469460_h;


0 01111 0101011110
exponent = 0b01111 = 15
mantissa = 0101011110
= 1 + 1/4 + 1/16 + 1/32 + 1/64 + 1/128 + 1/256 + 1/512
= (1024 + 256 + 64 + 32 + 16 + 8 + 4 + 2) / 1024
= 1406 / 1024
= 1.373046875
= 1.3720703125

0b0011 1101 0101 1110
exponent = 0b01111 = 15
mantissa = 0b0101011110
